name: 1000 Rooms
description:
Fanmade parody of "Spooky's Jumpscare Mansion." 

The game currently goes up to room 200, but you can stop after 175. It is a major WIP and I plan to finish it.


I'd appreciate any and all feedback, you can give it to me in dms or in this short form
https://forms.gle/FtncNqYqHXxhzjqg7
